executive_summary: Revenue growth increased by 14.5% from 16,400,000 INR in 2023 to 18,750,000 INR in 2024.
Profit After Tax increased by 39.1% from 1,920,000 INR in 2023 to 2,670,000 INR in 2024.
The company's cash flow from operating activities increased by 19.2% from 2,600,000 INR in 2023 to 3,100,000 INR in 2024.
The company's total assets increased by 15.9% from 16,350,000 INR in 2023 to 18,950,000 INR in 2024.
The company's long-term borrowings decreased by 10.7% from 2,800,000 INR in 2023 to 2,500,000 INR in 2024.

key_metrics.name: Debt-to-Equity Ratio (Long-term Borrowings + Short-term Liabilities) / Equity

top_risks.title: High Debt Levels
top_risks.description: The company's debt levels are high, with a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.63, which may affect its ability to meet its financial obligations.

top_risks.title: Dependence on Sales Revenue
top_risks.description: The company's revenue is highly dependent on sales, which may make it vulnerable to market fluctuations and changes in consumer demand.

top_risks.title: Increasing Administrative Expenses
top_risks.description: The company's administrative expenses have increased by 8.6% from 1,980,000 INR in 2023 to 2,150,000 INR in 2024, which may affect its profitability.
